main event: A bright, round or oval-shaped object was sighted hovering in the sky over Sweetwater, South Carolina in October 1960.
interesting points: The object emitted a bright white light and appeared to be tilting or swaying slightly.
The object was observed for about 15 minutes before suddenly disappearing straight up out of sight.
Although investigated, no supporting evidence or other witnesses were found to corroborate the sighting.
No radar tracking or other reports from other sources were received at the time.
The Air Force evaluation was that the sighting was likely a hoax or imaginative report due to the lack of physical evidence.
sighted object: a bright, round or oval-shaped object
